top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave
Violet has out done herself on this cover!!! I absolutely love it!!!!
3:29 failed opportunity for Chucky to play the drum fill
Not sure if it's the the synth, vocals, or the visuals... Goosebumps every time.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Sounds pretty good. Never heard of you before but hopefully it works out for you.
I'm sure it was also Dave's pleasure to die in your video :)
What the goonny goo goo is this 😂😂😂 …
That was dark, awesome and goose bumpy good!
Such a beautiful song.... wasted for a Halloween performance by an awesome singer...
I don't think there's a single British person on earth who hears in the air, and doesn't immediately recall the Cadbury gorilla advert
I always loved the original and like Nonpoint's cover.  Yours brings a great feel, like this should have been on the original Crow or Sons of Anarchy soundtracks!  Thank you!!
That's simply wonderful, great version with an italian duo (like me😊), thanks Violet for have choosen to collabs with Melodicka Bro, a big kiss from Italy 😘❤🖤
